conversation.content: I cancelled our venue reservation three days ago but haven't received any confirmation. Our event was scheduled for this Saturday.
I understand your concern about the Saturday event. Let me locate your reservation immediately using your confirmation number or the name on the booking.
The original booking was under Harrison Industries, confirmation number VR-8847-L.
Thank you. I've pulled up reservation VR-8847-L for Harrison Industries, originally scheduled for Saturday, November 23rd at our downtown location for 150 guests.
That's correct. I submitted the cancellation online Tuesday morning but your system never sent the confirmation email.
I can see the cancellation was initiated at 9:47 AM on Tuesday, November 19th, but it appears the final processing step encountered a system error.
That's concerning. Does this mean I'm still financially responsible for the full amount?
Let me resolve this immediately. I'm completing the cancellation now and waiving the standard 72-hour cancellation fee of $450 given our system's failure to process your request properly.
I appreciate that. Can you confirm the full deposit will be refunded?
Absolutely.
When should I expect to see that refund processed?
Your deposit of $2,750 will be refunded to the card ending in 4429 within 5 to 7 business days, and you'll receive an email confirmation within the next hour.
Thank you. This has been stressful given how close we are to the event date.
I completely understand your concern. To ensure everything is properly documented, I'm sending you cancellation reference number CAN-9923-XLM along with a formal cancellation letter for your records.
That would be helpful. Will this show the cancellation was initiated on Tuesday as I requested?
Yes, the documentation will clearly show your original cancellation request from Tuesday, November 19th at 9:47 AM, along with today's completion timestamp and my agent ID SR-4012.
Perfect. I assume this means we have no remaining obligations or charges?
Correct. Your account balance is zero, all future charges have been cancelled, and you'll receive the full $2,750 deposit refund with no penalties.
Excellent. Thank you for resolving this quickly and professionally.
You're very welcome. You should receive the confirmation email at the address ending in @harrisonindustries.com within the hour, and please don't hesitate to call if you need anything else.

scenario: anxious about cancelling before a big event and needing confirmation it went through
